page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF part 1
page.content: I woke up on Saturday morning ate breakfast then went with Dad to take Mum to work. Before returning I bought a camera in Boots for Â£15. When I got home I decided to go for a walk around Lynsted with my brother to try my camera. We live at Japonica Cottage, Ludgate Lane & I'm Anna Budd. First we walked up Ludgate Lane then took some photographs of Four Acres, a big house with a bumpy drive up to it next to some cornfields. We carried on then turned left over a fence & along a gravelly track, next we climbed over another fence & through a cherry orchard. We took some photos of the sheep next to the orchard, & climbed over a stile to a road, crossing it & going along another one & down a hill past a cherry orchard & a sheep field. Peter climbed up a tree & Matthias & I took some photos of the trees & things
